message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to own a product that has been carefully curated for you. With only 20 products available, this is a rare chance to get your hands on something special. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. What do you say? Will you take the chance and make this purchase?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the opportunity, I'd like to see some more data on the products before making a decision.  It would be helpful to see if any other buyers have purchased a product and what the quality of those products was.  Once I have more information, I'll be happy to reconsider.

I completely understand your request for more information! I'm happy to share that out of the 1 product I've sold so far, 1 of them was high-quality. That's a 50% success rate! I'm confident that this next product is also high-quality, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. Would you like to take a chance on this potentially amazing product?
